lead_paragraph: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi announced a series of incentives to the poor, farmers, women and small businesses on Saturday in a New Year's address, and defended his recent decision to abolish high denomination bank notes.
snippet: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi announced a series of incentives to the poor, farmers, women and small businesses on Saturday in a New Year's address, and defended his recent decision to abolish high denomination bank notes....

headline.main: India's PM Modi Defends Cash Ban, Announces Incentives
headline.print_headline: India's PM Modi Defends Cash Ban, Announces Incentives
